name: Synthesis (dyep-dev, junpolni)
description:
The game is a puzzle action platformer game, where you work together by utilizing the powers of Sky Bond and Star Alpha. As they unleash and make way through the corporation, witnessing inhumane and unethical works.

Entry for CIIT Syntax Coding in the Rain Game Jam following the theme of "Together".  Developed by 2 persons (Geoff Mendoza and Fiona Brozas) in their free time in span of almost a month.

Controls:
A/D - to move
Space - to jump
Left Shift - to change character
Left Mouse - to cast elemental skill
Right Mouse - to swap/change elements
